rooms.description: Spacious entry hall with reception area and space for display.
Large open-plan living space that maximizes natural light through large windows; designed following Vastu principles to face the East for positive energy.
Fully equipped kitchen with integrated dining area; ventilation design incorporates exhaust fans and cross-ventilation.
Separate quarters for domestic help located near service areas but ensuring privacy; includes small balcony for fresh air.
Storage and utility space for household items, appliances, and laundry area.

openings.description: Large windows installed in the living room and kitchen to ensure ample natural light and cross-ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached private bathroom; oriented towards the east for natural morning light.
Private balcony adjoining the master bedroom for relaxation and fresh air.
Fully equipped bathroom with en-suite facilities; includes proper ventilation.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows ensuring ample daylight and cross-ventilation.
